For Sale: Tranquil Estate with Income Opportunities in Matadera, Noord Nestled in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Matadera, Noord, this exceptional property offers the perfect blend of tranquility and income-generating potential. Set on a spacious 3,569m² (38,400 sq ft) lot, the estate provides ample privacy, surrounded by lush tropical gardens that create a serene retreat, all while being conveniently located near the island's key attractions. The estate features a beautifully designed 4-bedroom main residence, offering generous living space and modern comforts. The open-concept layout of the home is complemented by soaring cathedral ceilings, creating a bright and airy atmosphere throughout. An expansive L-shaped porch allows for ultimate relaxation, providing the perfect spot to enjoy the warm Aruban sunshine. For outdoor enjoyment, the property boasts a tropical pool with a beach volleyball and tennis court, ideal for both relaxation and entertainment. In addition to the main house, the property includes four fully furnished apartments, offering excellent rental opportunities. Attached to the main residence is a 1-bedroom apartment, perfect for short-term or long-term tenants. Separate from the house, there are three additional apartments: one 3-bedroom apartment and two 2-bedroom apartments. These apartments offer privacy and comfort, making them ideal for generating a steady income stream. Altogether, the property provides a total of 12 bedrooms — 4 in the main residence and 8 in the apartments — offering ample space for both owners and guests. The estate ensures both privacy and comfort, making it the perfect environment for those seeking a personal retreat or a profitable investment. The expansive grounds are beautifully landscaped, featuring rock gardens, scenic walking paths, and shaded terraces with palapas. The lush tropical garden, filled with palm trees, cacti, and vibrant flowers, attracts local wildlife such as hummingbirds, parakeets, and butterflies. There’s also a large swimming pool surrounded by plenty of lounging space, adding to the tranquil outdoor living experience. Property Highlights: This property offers not only a spacious home but also a fantastic investment opportunity with potential for consistent rental income. Whether you're looking for a private retreat or a business opportunity, this estate in Matadera is sure to fulfill your needs. For more information or to schedule a private viewing, please contact Edwin Hekman at +297 592 2506 or edwin.hekman@kw-aruba.com. Set on a generous 635 m² plot of lease land, this two-story residence combines comfort, space, and a relaxed tropical lifestyle. With approximately 271 m² of living space on the ground floor, upstairs and a separate studio plus storage room, the home offers flexible options for family life and guests. Step onto the welcoming porch and into a bright, airy living and dining area with high ceilings and an open layout. Large windows and open sightlines fill the home with natural light, creating an inviting atmosphere. The living and dining spaces flow seamlessly into a well-equipped kitchen, making daily routines and entertaining effortless.The ground floor features two spacious bedrooms, each with its own ensuite bathroom. Upstairs, a third bedroom comes with a walk-in closet, its own bathroom, and a balcony overlooking the front yard. A separate laundry area and access to a cozy back patio add to the convenience and ease of living. Outside, the front and side gardens are paved with concrete clinkers and accented with elegant palm trees and cacti. A round pool sits at the center of a lush, tropical setting, surrounded by mature trees, an ideal spot for relaxing, sunbathing, or hosting friends and family. A pergola together with a palapa offers a shaded retreat, while ample parking along the side of the property ensures practicality. Tucked into the corner of the property, a separate studio, provides a variety of possibilities, whether as a guest suite, home office, creative space, or independent rental. A storage room can be found there as well. A wooden terrace along the side of the house, accessible by exterior stairs, provides a tranquil place to enjoy pleasant views. With generous indoor and outdoor spaces, thoughtful design, and room to grow, this home is ready to accommodate your lifestyle while embracing the relaxed charm of island living. For more information please send an email to niek@remaxaruba.com or WhatsApp +297 5929780.

Spectacular Residence with amazing spa This condo comes with a garage box HOA fees total $727 (Las Rocas 7 $336 + Master Association $391) Tierra del Sol Golf & Resort
Located on approximately 600 acres of pristine landscape, Tierra del Sol is Aruba’s premier master-planned gated community. It features an 18-hole championship golf course by Robert Trent Jones II, world-class resort and country-club amenities, spa & wellness facilities, a fitness center, tennis courts, lush landscaping, and gourmet dining. Las Rocas
A desirable neighborhood within Tierra del Sol. Known for condominiums that combine luxury, privacy, and premium access to resort amenities. Residences in Las Rocas appeal to those seeking elegant, well-designed living spaces with excellent location and views. (Comparable Las Rocas condos show open plans, good light, balconies, and connection to the golf course.) Convenience & Lifestyle
Just minutes away from Palm Beach, Malmok Beach, fine dining, shopping and nightlife, yet tucked away enough to escape the bustle. Your home in Las Rocas gives you access to resort tranquility—with all the essentials close by. Privacy & Comfort: Two floors give separation between entertainment / living areas and private bedrooms. Elevated Quality: All the craftsmanship, finishes, and upgrades needed for modern, stylish living—ready to move in. Resort Living Every Day: Used not just as a residence, but as your own retreat. Swim, golf, relax, dine—all without leaving the community. Investment & Prestige: Properties in Tierra del Sol tend to hold and increase their value due to the high level of amenities, gated setting, and demand for premium real estate on Aruba. Step into one of Aruba’s most promising real estate opportunities: a brand-new apartment complex located in the highly desirable area of Ponton, right in the center of the island. Investors can choose to keep it as a steady, income-generating rental property, transform it into a short-stay vacation hotspot, or develop it into a unique mixed-use concept that stands out in Aruba’s growing hospitality industry. Subject Line: Papaya 6-P – A Rare Opportunity in the Heart of Aruba
Description:
Papaya 6-P – A Rare Opportunity in the Heart of Aruba Welcome to Papaya, one of Aruba’s most desirable neighborhoods. Known for its pastoral charm, privacy, and unbeatable central location, this area offers the best of both worlds: a peaceful natural setting while being just minutes away from everyday conveniences. Location Highlights: The Property
Set on a fully owned (“eigendomsgrond”) lot of 459 m² (4,940 sq. ft.), this property offers a lush, private oasis surrounded by fruit trees, palm trees, and natural beauty. The lot is partially enclosed by a concrete wall, offering privacy. The property currently features two separate buildings: Endless Potential
Papaya 6-P is a unique investment opportunity for buyers with vision and creativity. With some upgrades and landscaping, this property could be transformed into: Condition & Opportunity
The buildings require some maintenance—primarily painting, woodwork, minor roof repairs, and interior updates. Some A/C units may also need replacement. These factors are already reflected in the very attractive asking price of: AWG 425,000, supported by a recent appraisal report. Bonus: This property was once part of a larger complex together with Papaya 9-R, which can still be purchased as a package deal if desired. See other listing. Seller is open to reasonable, motivated offers.

Endless Potential with Breathtaking Views – 6-Bedroom Home on Palisiaweg, San Nicolas Set high on the serene hillside of Palisiaweg in San Nicolas, this impressive 6-bedroom property offers space, privacy, and panoramic views that stretch across both Savaneta and San Nicolas. More than just a family home, this unique estate is bursting with potential, ideal for a private residence, a multi-family setup, or even a boutique hotel or bed & breakfast. The layout of the property is expansive and functional. With six bedrooms, three full-sized living rooms, and two kitchens, there’s enough space for large families, long-term guests, or independent rental units. Each area has been thoughtfully designed to maintain a sense of openness and comfort, while still allowing for privacy and separation when needed. Imagine waking up to the fresh Caribbean breeze in your private garden, hosting family or guests in one of the multiple livings areas or preparing meals in one of the two spacious kitchens. The versatility of this property makes it a dream for both personal enjoyment and income-generating purposes. One of the home’s most attractive features is the man/woman cave with its own private outdoor lounge, perfect for entertaining or simply unwinding while enjoying some of the most spectacular views Aruba has to offer. This space could easily be converted into a guest suite, creative studio, or private bar for visitors if you're considering hospitality opportunities. The extensive outdoor area is a true blank canvas with more than enough space to build a swimming pool, outdoor dining area, sun decks, or even additional guest rooms or cabanas. Whether you dream of opening a charming bed & breakfast, transforming the home into a multi-unit vacation rental, or simply enjoying the space as a private family compound, the possibilities are wide open. Located in a quiet, elevated part of San Nicolas yet still within a short drive to beaches, shops, and restaurants, this home blends the best of both worlds: peaceful seclusion and accessible convenience. If you’re looking for a solid investment opportunity in Aruba’s growing southern region or searching for a forever home with room to expand, this one-of-a-kind property on Palisiaweg deserves your attention. With its unmatched layout, flexible zoning potential, and postcard-worthy views, the future is truly what you make it here.

Centrally located in the neighborhood of Regents Park, Oranjestad, this single-family home is a harmonious blend of elegance and thoughtful design. With its expansive 1,099 m² of property land, this property is thoughtfully designed to offer a comfortable lifestyle. Step inside and experience a welcoming open layout that seamlessly connects each room. Featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, including one currently used as a home office, and 2 bathrooms. The fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar is perfect for both cooking and entertaining. A laundry room conveniently located next to the kitchen adds to the home's practicality. A one bedroom apartment with an ensuite bathroom attached to the garage offers additional living space, making it ideal for guests or as a private retreat. Both the main home and the apartment feature PVC exterior doors with double glazing, while the windows are crafted from a mix of cedarwood, PVC, and aluminum, showcasing quality craftsmanship throughout. The outdoor spaces are equally impressive. A newly upgraded swimming pool with a pool bar invites you to unwind, while the lush garden, featuring mature trees and vibrant plants, offers a private oasis. Recent upgrades, including an insulated roof, renovated veranda flooring, and refreshed garden fencing, ensure that every detail has been carefully considered. For added convenience, this home includes a carport for two cars and a 12 m² garden storage unit. Sustainability and security are at the heart of this property, with 10 kW solar panels, a solar water heater and an integrated alarm system. The location of this home provides easy access to schools, shopping, and essential amenities, while being just a short drive from Oranjestad’s city center, beaches such as Surfside, and the island’s main highway leading to popular areas like Noord. An updated appraisal report is available. For more information or to schedule a viewing please contact me at (+297) 592 9780 or niek@remaxaruba.com.

Subject Line: Palm Aruba 216 – Your Private Oasis in the Heart of Palm Beach

Whether you're looking for a full-time residence, a vacation getaway, or a high-performing rental, Palm Aruba 216 offers the perfect blend of comfort, location, and lifestyle. Oceanfront Elegance in Malmok – Aruba’s Most Exclusive Villa A villa of this caliber rarely comes to market. Perfectly positioned directly on the ocean in Malmok, with the Caribbean Sea as your backyard, breathtaking sunsets every evening, and the island’s most pristine beaches within walking distance. This is not just a home – this is pure oceanfront luxury. Fully renovated, fully furnished, and move-in ready, this estate combines timeless design with modern sophistication. From the elegant circular driveway, double front doors open into a spacious living area where the open design seamlessly connects to the backyard, creating an immediate sense of light and flow. A semi-open layout flows seamlessly into the fully equipped chef’s kitchen with a grand island – offering panoramic sea views that make cooking a true experience. The villa offers 5 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms across two levels. On the ground floor, two bright and spacious bedrooms each feature their own ensuite bathroom, providing comfort and privacy. A stylish powder room and an attached two-car garage with direct access to a dedicated laundry room complete this level. Upstairs, soaring ceilings define the second living area, with spectacular ocean views from every angle. An enclosed terrace offers a unique 360° panorama of the Caribbean Sea, while a large outdoor terrace expands the living space even further. The upper floor is home to three bedrooms: a spacious suite with its own ensuite bathroom, a versatile guest room, and the spectacular master suite with wraparound ocean views, a spa-like bathroom with jacuzzi, and a walk-in closet. Completing the upper level is a private gym overlooking the salina, while a second laundry room provides added ease and practicality. The property is fully gated and secured, ensuring complete privacy. The backyard offers a heated pool and shaded seating area, designed for outdoor living in comfort. A detached one-bedroom apartment with full kitchen and bath completes the estate, perfect for guests or staff. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own one of Aruba’s rare oceanfront estates – where luxury, design, and location meet at the highest level. Unique Commercial Property on Santa Helenastraat, Oranjestad, Aruba
Ideal for Institutional, Office, or Retail Use Located just north of Oranjestad’s vibrant harbour district, this versatile 10,000 m² property offers a unique opportunity for investors or organizations seeking a move-in ready campus or easily convertible commercial development in the heart of Aruba. Originally constructed as a university campus, the property features a ±4,100 m² built-up area that can seamlessly transition into retail, office, or institutional use. Its single‑storey layout, flexible infrastructure, and prime location make it well-suited for uses ranging from corporate headquarters or medical centers to shopping plazas or government offices. The main building (3,504 m²) is centered around wide, open-air hallways that promote natural airflow. It contains over 25 multi-purpose rooms, including classrooms, laboratories, testing centers, and support spaces—all of which are individually climate-controlled with split-unit air conditioning and equipped with private bathrooms. These rooms can easily be reconfigured into offices, clinics, or retail units. The large auditorium (323 m²) is equipped with full audio-visual capabilities and is ideal for conferences, training events, or conversion into additional leasable space. It is not tiered, allowing for maximum flexibility of use. A 587 m² fully air-conditioned storage building sits to the rear of the property and can be utilized as climate-controlled warehousing or converted into additional classroom, simulation, retail, or office space. The campus also includes a paved and fully fenced parking lot with separate entry and exit points, providing approximately 140 on-site parking spaces—an exceptional amenity for any commercial or institutional use. Additional highlights: 10,000 m² of deeded property land Approx. 4,100 m² total built-up space More than 25 flexible rooms with individual A/C and private bathrooms 323 m² multi-use auditorium with A/V Main office area with central A/C, common workspace, and private offices Fully air-conditioned storage building Approx. 140 on-site parking spaces Building-wide fiber internet and dual voltage (110 V/220 V) Full central monitoring with CCTV system Appraisal report available upon request for seriously interested buyers This is a rare chance to acquire a centrally located, ready-to-operate property in one of the Caribbean’s most business-friendly environments—with the added benefit of flexible conversion potential for a wide range of uses. This house was built around 1900 and was left in ruins when the owner bought it.The new owner had promised the previous owner to restore it to its original shape and build, as much as possible, adding some modern features and making it a comfortable place to live in.This challenge took three years to accomplish in the way I thought the place deserved.All the walls were stripped of their outer layer of plaster, then reinforced with concrete beams and columns.The missing coral stones were hand-cut and replaced to match the existing ones.To add electric and plumbing to a house that wasn't built with that capacity, we had to dig trenches between the coral walls—a painstaking job that took months but yielded very satisfactory results.The LED light strips on the walls draw attention to the workmanship of the fishermen who built this house back when there were no power tools.The Kruispan-Dakpannen roof tiles were imported from Holland; there is only one manufacturer left in the world.The floor tiles were brought from abroad and beautifully dress the house.Both bathrooms were equipped with toilet bowls and sinks with a 1900s look. The sink bases are made of South American tree roots.To make the house more spacious, we built an outdoor kitchen with Italian windows and sliding doors that open to the front and back yards, allowing the breeze to blow through while you cook in this well-equipped kitchen with double ovens and all available features.The pool was a big innovation for Aruba.We brought the idea from Spain and built a sand pool with a beach entrance that integrates with the natural stone surround and lush green landscape.At sunset, the yard brightens up along with the surrounding wall lights, changing the scene to an amazing oasis of peace and comfort, with a surround Bose sound system.To finish, there is a terrace where you can watch the sunset.

- UNDER CONTRACT - Introducing an exceptional investment opportunity in the heart of Aruba’s capital region: an income-generating commercial apartment building situated on 690 m² of long lease land in the thriving Paradijswijk / Santa Helena area. Just minutes from downtown Oranjestad, the international airport and the hotel district, this property combines prime location with reliable rental potential. This well-maintained building offers twelve fully independent apartment units, each with a combined living, kitchen and sleeping area, as well as ensuite bathrooms outfitted with fixtures and full ceramic tile finishes. The units vary in size, with a total built-up area of approximately 316 m² and are supported by reinforced concrete construction, aluminum windows and doors and ceramic flooring throughout. All apartments are equipped with air-conditioning, individual water and electricity meters, and kitchens featuring granite countertops, cabinetry, stainless steel sinks and stainless steel cooking tops. Ten units use gas for cooking, while two units are equipped with electric stoves. The electricity meters for the apartments operate on a prepaid basis, while only the main (general) meter is postpaid. Currently, all apartments are connected to IPTV and internet service from Setar, each with its own individual modem/router box. Shared amenities include the outdoor common area and a laundry room equipped with a washing machine and gas dryer (both coin-operated). The premises also houses a storage room. In total, the property comprises three buildings. The building is equipped with outdoor lighting and is enclosed with masonry fencing and gated access on both the north and south sides. Dedicated paved private parking spaces provide added convenience for tenants, with two septic tanks located beneath the parking area. The property benefits from excellent infrastructure and accessibility. This complex offers immediate rental income across apartments thanks to its strategic central location and ease of access to key businesses and universities such as the Xavier University School of Medicine, the University of Aruba and the American University School of Medicine among others. Investors will value the functional layout, low-maintenance landscaping and the strong potential for consistent rental returns. Whether you are expanding a rental portfolio or looking for a commercial asset with a high occupancy outlook, this is a great chance to secure a turn-key multifamily property in the island’s rental market. For more information please send an email to niek@remaxaruba.com or WhatsApp +297 5929780.

Introducing a Benchmark for Sustainable Business Living Positioned at the heart of the Island’s vibrant capital, just minutes from the courthouse and business-school district, this modern and practical office complex redefines the standard for environmentally conscious design. Conceived by a renowned architect and completed in 2010/2011, the property blends forward-thinking functionality with a keen sensitivity to the environment. Crafted using natural, sustainable materials and designed to achieve LEED Gold-level certification, t, boasting features like solar panels, smart technology integration. With a commitment to superior indoor air quality, energy efficiency, and durability, this property is a beacon of eco-friendly innovation and practical elegance. In addition to its thoughtfully designed office spaces, the complex includes two detached adjacent apartments—perfect for executive lodging or flexible commercial use. Whether you're expanding your business presence or seeking an investment in sustainable real estate, this offering connects you with a global standard of green luxury living. Here, sustainability is not just a feature — it’s the foundation. Main Office Building – Approx. 300 sqm Built-Up Area
The primary structure features a spacious and functional layout, including: An inviting entrance hall A dedicated library A professional meeting room Secretariat/administrative area Staff pantry Restroom facilities Server/storage closet Archiving room Three individual offices (Office 1, Office 2, and Office 3) Apartment 1 – Approx. 42 sqm Built-Up Area
A comfortable two-bedroom apartment, complete with: Private bathroom Semi-laundry room Separate enclosed storage room Apartment 2 – Approx. 25 sqm Built-Up Area
A compact and efficient studio apartment in a container-style unit, offering: Private bathroom
Ideal for staff accommodation or guest lodging. Technical Specifications The property is fully serviced with water, electricity, telephone, internet, cable TV, data network, and sewer connections. Water Supply: All water pipes are constructed with high-quality copper tubes and fittings. Electrical System: The buildings are equipped with a dual-voltage electricity network, offering 127V and 220V connections. Communication Networks: Telephone, internet, cable TV, and data infrastructure are installed using CAT 5 fiber. Sewerage: Drainage is managed through PVC piping with fittings, directly connected to the municipal sewer system. Solar Energy: Solar panels generating 4.2 kW (P) are installed on the main façade. Additional solar panels providing 10 kW (P) are mounted on the roof. Both systems are connected to the building's electrical network and feature rotary meters for energy monitoring. Lighting: The entire complex is fitted with energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures. Climate Control: The main office building features a central air conditioning system based on a VRV (Variable Refrigerant Volume) inverter technology. The two detached buildings are each equipped with individual split-type inverter air conditioning systems. Construction Details The buildings are constructed using concrete stone masonry walls, supported by reinforced concrete structural elements to ensure durability and stability. Apartment 2 features a fully steel-framed second storey, designed as a container-style structure. All masonry walls are finished with a sand-cement plaster for a clean and uniform appearance. All structures are fitted with gently sloping roofs: The office building and apartment 1 have roofs supported by a combination of wooden trusses and/or steel beams with battens and purlins. Apartment 2 incorporates a steel roof structure integrated into its container-based design. Roof finishes vary by building: The office building is topped with plywood sheathing, finished with a durable EPDM membrane. The detached buildings are roofed with corrugated aluminum panels. Eaves across all buildings are neatly finished with wood fiberboard paneling. A timber pergola roof connects the two detached units, providing a shaded outdoor space. Flooring: The office building and Apartment 2 have reinforced concrete floors laid over compacted soil fill. Apartment 1 features a stamped concrete floor on fill. The second floor of apartment 2 is constructed as a structural wooden floor. Finishes and Aesthetic Features The property showcases high-quality finishes throughout, reflecting a blend of functionality and elegance. Flooring: Most floors in the office building are finished with luxurious polished ceramic tiles, offering both durability and aesthetic appeal. In Detached Building 1, selected areas feature traditional hydraulic cement tiles. The second floor of Detached Building 2 is finished with wood laminate, adding warmth and character. The ground floor of Detached Building 1 has a stamped concrete finish. Outdoor Surfaces: A concrete walkway, finished with natural stone, leads from the garden wall to the office building entrance. The natural stone detailing continues into the office building’s entrance area, creating a seamless transition. Between the buildings, a central patio is also finished in natural stone over concrete. Concrete pavers connect the office building to both detached units and extend toward the garden wall, forming a functional and cohesive outdoor circulation path. Walls & Columns: Interior walls are plastered and painted with high-quality acrylic paint. In kitchens, bathrooms, and toilets, walls are finished with sleek glazed ceramic tiles. Columns within the office building are elegantly clad in a mosaic of luxury glass and natural stone. Ceilings: The majority of ceilings throughout the office and detached buildings are finished with plasterboard. At the office building entrance, a concrete ceiling doubles as a canopy and is complemented by decorative wooden ceiling planks. Windows & Doors: Windows are a combination of fixed and operable (hung) types, all set in durable hardwood frames. The main façade of the office building features striking hardwood fixed louvres for both sun control and architectural interest. All glazing in the office building consists of thermally insulated double-pane safety glass. Doors: Exterior doors are hardwood paneled, with the main entrance door constructed from safety glass for a modern, secure finish. Interior doors are primarily sleek factory-made flush doors, with one office featuring a decorative glass sliding door. Exterior Features: The front of the office building is defined by a prominent full-height stone feature wall, adding visual weight and distinction. The side and rear garden areas are enclosed with custom ornamental iron gates, enhancing both security and curb appeal. Kitchen and Sanitary Facilities The pantry and kitchens across the property are thoughtfully designed and outfitted with custom-built cabinetry, including both base and wall-mounted units. These cabinets are constructed from high-quality furniture-grade boards and finished with a full coat of paint for a clean, modern look. In the office building and Detached Building 2, the sink countertops are finished in elegant granite, paired with stainless steel sinks. Detached Building 1 features a stainless steel countertop and sink, ideal for practical daily use. Bathrooms in both detached residential units include: Fully tiled walk-in showers Modern ceramic toilets Matching ceramic washbasins Additionally, apartment 1 is complemented by a covered outdoor laundry area, offering convenience for residents or staff. Garden and Outdoor Areas The property features a fully enclosed garden, bordered by a concrete stone perimeter wall that offers privacy and security. On the street-facing side, the enclosure consists of a lower wall combined with concrete columns for an open, welcoming appearance. The south side provides enhanced privacy with sections of the wall exceeding 2 meters in height. Along the east side, the wall stands at approximately 1.4 meters high. A paved driveway and parking area are located on the west side of the garden, ensuring practical vehicle access and convenience. The garden itself is attractively landscaped with various plantings and features a gravel ground cover for low-maintenance upkeep. An automated drip irrigation system is installed to support healthy vegetation and efficient water usage year-round. Surroundings and Neighborhood Location & Setting:
The property is situated on a quiet, dead-end paved road—just off Van Leeuwenhoek Street—east of the Maria College school complex in Oranjestad. Nestled in a peaceful residential neighborhood, the area is characterized by well-maintained homes, several of which have been recently renovated. Despite its tranquil setting, the property is just a short walk from the vibrant center of Oranjestad, offering a perfect balance of privacy and accessibility. Accessibility:
The location offers excellent access, with well-paved roads leading directly to the property. Parking:
Convenient on-site parking is available at the front of the property, with access via a paved side road that runs along the front boundary of the lot.

Step into a comfortable island lifestyle in this spacious two-story villa, located in the quiet residential neighborhood of Camacuri, just five minutes from the beach, downtown Oranjestad and Aruba’s international airport. Set on a generous 1,567 m² of property land, this well-kept residence offers plenty of room to live, relax and entertain. With five bedrooms, five full bathrooms, two half bathrooms, a garage, storage, private office, TV-room, large pool with pool bar and a beautiful orchid garden with pond, this home is perfect for families or those who love to host. As you enter the villa, the welcoming hallway leads to the left where you will find the spacious master suite, complete with built-in closets, a luxurious bathroom with both a bathtub and shower, and a walk-in closet. Sliding doors open directly to the patio, allowing the Caribbean breeze to greet you each morning. A powder room for guests is conveniently located nearby. At the center of the home is the spacious living room, with wide sliding doors that open to the patio, creating a natural flow between indoor and outdoor spaces. It’s an inviting setting for casual afternoons or entertaining friends. Nearby, the air-conditioned TV room offers a cozy spot for movie nights and a separate office with its own outdoor entrance adds flexibility for working from home. On the right side of the villa, the dining area and fully upgraded kitchen become the center of daily living. With its U-shape design, this kitchen is a dream for any chef, outfitted with an abundance of cabinetry (more than 70 cabinets and drawers) along with premium appliances including a dishwasher, built-in stove, oven, double refrigerators and even deep fryers. A new exhaust hood has recently been installed. Adjacent to the kitchen are a storage area and a spacious laundry room, keeping your home neat and organized.Toward the back of the home, a private bedroom with its own entrance and en-suite bathroom makes for a perfect live-in space or guest quarters. Upstairs, three more bedrooms each come with their own bathrooms and built-in closets. Two of the bedrooms have private balconies that overlook the garden, a lovely place to enjoy a quiet morning or a sunset view. From this level, you can also see Aruba’s Hooiberg. A large attic of 37 m² adds extra storage options. The backyard is a highlight of the property, designed for easy outdoor living. The 55 m² pool is perfect for cooling off and there’s a poolside bar, tropical palapa, outdoor shower and guest bathroom—all surrounded by landscaped gardens and a peaceful orchid garden with a pond. It’s an ideal setting for casual get-togethers and relaxation. The entire property has been freshly painted and the roof has been completely renewed. The villa is fully fenced with high walls and a remote-controlled gate, offering both security and privacy. There is parking for three cars in the covered carport, plus a garage and a large 64 m² storage room. A separate service entrance at the back allows easy access for pool and garden maintenance. Sustainability has also been considered, with solar panels providing almost all the home’s electricity, a solar water heater, two septic tanks, and an irrigation system. The home also features an indoor and outdoor alarm system connected to 24/7 monitoring and WiFi is installed throughout. For those looking to expand, an adjacent parcel of land measuring 754 m² is available for separate purchase, offering potential for future development or additional outdoor space. An up-to-date appraisal is available. For more information or to schedule a viewing please contact me at (+297) 592 9780 or niek@remaxaruba.com. This villa is a Miracle Home meaning a donation is made to one of Aruba's non-profit children’s organizations once this property is sold.

Welcome to your very own private oasis in the middle of the island. This is Casa Hideaway. This property is perfect for anyone with a talent for making something great even better! Perfect for entertaining guests and taking al-fresco dining to a whole new level. The main house measures at 484m2! Wandering deeper into the garden, you will find 3 buildings. These are where the 3 apartments are located. Apartment one consists of one bedroom, open concept kitchen, living room and bathroom. The front patio overlooks the pool area. Apartment one measures at 85m2. Apartment tow consists of three bedrooms, two bathrooms, open concept kitchen, living room and front patio overlooking the pool area. Apartment two measures at 89m2. Apartment three consists of two bedrooms, two bathrooms, open concept kitchen, living room and front patio overlooking the pool area. Apartment three measures at 91m2. The pool is absolutely divine and not only offers a great place to relax and take a refreshing swim, the grand gazebo next to it is the perfect spot for great parties or even creating the ultimate lounge area. At the back-end of the property you will find a water well, currently in active use for watering the plants and filling up the pool. Talk about ecological, practical and just plain smart! There is also a separate laundry area and extra storage shed. This property has recently been fully renovated and is turn-key. The apartments have a long time rental history, making it a ready to go smart investment. Private parking is more than available on the lot and the entire property is fully fenced for optimum privacy. Just imagine arriving there and making money instantly... What could be better? Solar panels! So not only do you become the owner of the most wanted property on the island... you're doing it while being energy efficient! There is so much more to say about this property, but it wouldn't do it half the justice it deserves... So we invite you to come check it out yourself! Experience the epitome of luxury living at Sotavento 182G, a stunning beachfront property nestled in the exclusive Savaneta Beach community in Aruba. On the second floor, a second master bedroom with a private bath and walk-in closet offers a beachfront oasis. Additionally, two oceanfront bedrooms with private terraces and bathrooms provide an idyllic retreat. Each of these bedrooms includes a smaller entrance bedroom with a bunk bed, perfect for accommodating children. The ground floor encompasses the living room, dining and cooking area, and a full bathroom. A convenient laundry room with washer and dryer adds to the functionality of the home. For security and peace of mind, the property is equipped with exterior security cameras. At the sandy beachfront, guests can enjoy a charcoal barbecue grill and beach chairs, ensuring an unforgettable experience. Sotavento 182G is more than a residence; it's a sanctuary where luxury meets the tranquility of beachfront living. Embrace the Aruban lifestyle in this exclusive retreat, where every detail has been meticulously designed for an unparalleled living experience.

This is Island Life! Rich with unique design and deluxe amenities, this remarkable 4 bedroom, 4.5 baths comes complete with an outdoor kitchen, resort style pool and with 8 sleeps, making this the perfect family home or place for a tropical vacation home. Less than 5 minutes away from Aruba’s white sand beaches and Palm Beach strip, this home offers luxury and convenience in One Happy Home! The kitchen is spacious and filled with natural light, featuring state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances and ample storage within custom cabinetry. Admire the striking backsplash, elegant countertops, and sleek overhead range hood. A convenient cutout wall enhances flow, making it easy to serve, entertain, and stay connected. The dining area features a chic tree trunk dining table with a glass top, set for six—perfect for special occasions or intimate dinners. Natural light highlights the authentic décor, creating a stunning ambiance. Relax in the family room with a vibrant entertainment center, cozy sectional, high-backed chairs, and a large wall-mounted TV. Bedroom #1 highlights a room full of floral delight with a midcentury modern appeal. Here, you will find a King size bed with a blonde wood frame and woven rattan headboard, nightstands, and a cozy couch beneath the flat screen television. Not to mention, head through the glass barn door into your stunning en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Bedroom #2 Offers a stunning palmprint backdrop, upon a Queen size bed with a rustic backdrop, a pair of stately nightstands, matching dresser and a wall-mounted flat-screen television. Bedroom #3 A comfy Queen size bed sets upon a tropical accent wall, as a pair of chic table lamps set atop of raw wood night tables. Subject Line: Coral Shell GF-C – Luxury Oceanfront 3-Bedroom Condo in Oranjestad, Aruba
Description:
Price: $1,973,111
Total Size: 355.16 m² (4,136.50 sq. ft.)
Bedrooms: 3 | Bathrooms: 3.5
Parking: 2 Private Garages
HOA Fees: $1,675/month
Year Built: 2018 Welcome to Coral Shell GF-C, a rare opportunity to own a luxurious beachfront condo in Oranjestad, Aruba. This 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence offers spacious living areas, a private garden, and an expansive balcony with breathtaking Caribbean Sea views, creating a serene and elegant lifestyle in one of Aruba’s most prestigious addresses. Open-Concept Living: Floor-to-ceiling glass doors seamlessly blend indoor and outdoor spaces, leading to a private oceanfront terrace. Gourmet Kitchen: High-end kitchen with quartz countertops, custom cabinetry, and premium appliances, combining functionality with style. Master Suite Retreat: Featuring a spa-like en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and private garden access for an exclusive, tranquil escape. Two Additional Bedrooms: Both guest suites offer en-suite bathrooms and ample closet space, ensuring privacy and comfort. Expansive Outdoor Space: Enjoy a private balcony and lush garden, perfect for entertaining or relaxing while admiring Aruba’s spectacular sunsets. Premium Finishes: Marble flooring, high ceilings, and luxury fixtures create an atmosphere of modern coastal elegance. Exclusive Amenities: Residents benefit from private parking, 24/7 security, a fitness center, and direct beach access, providing a resort-like lifestyle. Built in 2018 by one of Aruba’s most prominent families, Coral Shell represents the pinnacle of oceanfront living. Every detail of this high-end condominium has been carefully crafted, offering superior materials, architectural excellence, and a highly exclusive community. Unlike traditional developments, Coral Shell is built entirely from solid concrete, ensuring unmatched durability, insulation, and soundproofing. The exterior façade is clad with natural coral stone, providing exceptional thermal properties that keep interiors cool even under Aruba’s tropical sun. Traditional Concrete Construction: Built for strength, longevity, and energy efficiency. Coral Stone Exterior: A premium heat-resistant material that enhances durability. High Ceilings & Oversized Doors: 2.9m ceilings and 2.8m doors create an expansive and airy living environment. Double-Glazed Insulated Windows with Argon Gas: Providing superior temperature control and sound insulation. Designed by a renowned Spanish architect from Barcelona, a disciple of Antoni Gaudí, Coral Shell embodies modern minimalism with Mediterranean influences, making it a standout property in Aruba. Coral Shell is the only condominium in Aruba equipped with a DOAS (Dedicated Outdoor Air System), ensuring optimal air quality and humidity control. This innovative ventilation system reduces humidity to 50%, eliminating mold, allergens, and excessive heat buildup. DOAS System in Apartments & Elevators: Enhancing fresh air circulation and comfort. Solar Panels: Lowering HOA costs while promoting sustainability. Gas & CO2 Detectors: Automatic shut-off for safety and continuous air quality monitoring. Industrial Ice Makers: Available in each unit and at the pool area. Living at Coral Shell means enjoying resort-style amenities and an unmatched level of luxury. Infinity Pool with Oceanfront Sun Deck: The perfect place to unwind with breathtaking views. State-of-the-Art Fitness Center: The only condo gym in Aruba with panoramic ocean views. Private Laundry Room in Each Unit: Offering residents the utmost convenience. In-Wall Cable Management: Keeping living spaces sleek and clutter-free. Minimalist, High-End Interior Finishes: Featuring Italian kitchens, built-in closets, and luxurious marble floors. Coral Shell offers the perfect balance of tranquil beachfront living and easy access to Aruba’s top attractions. Additionally, there is a studio apartment attached to the house, which has its own private entrance and dedicated garage. With modern finishes, breathtaking views, and multiple rental possibilities, this home is an exceptional find in Nuñe, Paradera. Whether you’re looking for a comfortable family home or an investment opportunity with great income potential, this property offers versatility, space, and an unbeatable location. The above mentioned property is a lot in between some houses at the west-side next to the boundary of Ponton/Tank Lender and at the east-side an undeveloped area. The undeveloped area has been sub-divided into allotments for future commercial development and/or housing projects. The property is a piece of property land (self-ownership) of 8.101 square meters and is very conveniently located, for residential and/or commercial purposes. The property is situated almost on the boundary of the north side of Ponton and further north and east, right on the boundary of Tanki Lender. At the northern side of this property there is this recently open the new highway cross road, the Watty Vos Boulevard, starting from the Queen Beatrix Int'l Airport leading all the way to the hotel areas. This belt-railway give easy accessibility to the hotel areas and wil cross/pass right in front and at the north side of this property in question. The property is accessible via the east- and west side from the following streets: At the west side, the property has indirect connection with an asphalted road by the name of "Caya E.D. Petronia", which is connected on the main road leading to the capital of Aruba, Oranjestad. At the east side the property has indirect connection with an asphalted road, the Kamerlingh Onnesstraat, which crosses all the way through Tank Lender and Solito to Oranjestad. At the south side the asphalted road Tuturutustraat, which is connected to Caya Ernesto Petronia at the west-side and the Kamerlingh Onnesstraat at the east-side. The property is easy accessible via this traffic circle and is located approximately two (2) kilometer away from the downtown business, shopping- and entertainment district. At the west-side, the property bonds with several residential homes and at the south-, north- and far east-side across the streets the property bonds with residential homes as well and apparently in good conditions. The property is ideally situated within approx. 5 minutes driving distance to all parts of downtown business, shopping- and entertainment district of Aruba. As stated above, the property wil be probably designed and developed for commercial and/or combination commercial/living purposes, primarily due to its highly desirable location and its lot size. The property is located in one of the most exclusive residential area of Aruba. Its immediate proximity to the main road "Caya Ernesto Petronia", which is connectedon the main street leading to the capital of Aruba, Oranjestad, makes the property easy accessible. The property might be accessible via the the Watty Vos Boulevard, the belt-railway from the Queen Beatrix Int'l Airport and/or from the hotel area and via this traffic circle makes the location of the property even more desirable. The property is an empty lot with no buildings and is partially fenced and has the entire infrastructure necessary around it for a future development. The property had been recently clean-up from heavy vegetation and a masonry fence had been built at the north- and east side. At the west side, it bonds with the existing masonry wall fence from the neighbors and at the south side, it is unfenced to give access to the property. For More information contact: Muna Habash + 297- 5934647

Your Private Oasis Tucked into the serene hills of Boegoeroei in Noord Aruba, just 15 minutes from Reina Beatrix Airport, lies a rare gem that redefines tropical luxury. This breathtaking turnkey villa is not just a residence, it’s an experience, a sanctuary where elegance and privacy blend seamlessly into one unforgettable lifestyle. Welcome to the kind of Caribbean dream that doesn’t just exist in postcards, this is the real thing. From the moment the automatic gates glide open, you know you have arrived somewhere special. Towering palm trees whisper in the breeze, a peaceful Buddha statue greets you with calm energy, and a sense of serenity washes over you. Here, every moment feels effortless, timeless, and uniquely yours. Though the vibrant nightlife and famous beaches of Palm Beach are just minutes away, the tranquility of this hilltop hideaway makes you feel like the only person on the island. The View That Steals the Show Perched on an elevated plot, the villa offers sweeping panoramic views. By day, gaze out over the lush landscape and shimmering coastline. By night, the twinkling lights of Aruba’s luxury high-rise hotels glitter like distant stars. Beyond them, the vast Caribbean Sea stretches endlessly into the horizon, where coral reefs shimmer beneath the surface and private beaches await. It’s not just a view—it’s a living canvas that changes with the light. Smart Island Living, Reimagined This home is more than beautiful, it’s brilliantly thought out. Designed with sustainability and comfort in mind, the property is equipped with state-of-the-art eco-tech. Solar panels keep energy costs low. The lush tropical garden stays green and blooming thanks to smart irrigation and water reclamation systems, all remotely controlled. From lighting to security, everything is managed at the touch of a button, whether you're in Aruba or halfway around the globe. Even power outages are no match for the built-in generator, and for those days by the pool, automated floaters keep things perfect without lifting a finger. It's luxury with zero compromise. Spacious, Sophisticated and Full of Surprises Step inside the villa and discover 733 m2 of masterfully designed living space. Seven bedrooms. Six bathrooms. Three living rooms. A stunning mezzanine library. And a striking semi-circular pool that seems to melt into the house itself. One moment you're lounging on the terrace, and the next you’ve wandered into the open-concept living room through wide-folding doors. Inside feels like outside—and that’s exactly how it should be in paradise. Ceiling fans tucked artfully into the covered terrace offer both a breeze and warm ambiance after sunset. And as the vaulted ceiling rises above the terrace, it draws your eye to the mezzanine level, a private, light-filled workspace with French doors leading out to another intimate terrace. Below the mezzanine, the layout flows with effortless charm. Bedrooms, each with private bathrooms, are nestled near a country-style kitchen that invites slow mornings and long family meals. Room for Everyone, Room for Possibility Ideal for hosting guests or generating rental income, the villa includes a fully independent apartment on the lower level, featuring two spacious bedrooms and its own kitchen. It’s perfect for visiting family, friends, or short-term vacation rentals. But that’s not all. A separate guest house adds even more versatility, a complete residence in itself, with dazzling views and open-plan living designed to capture the same luxurious feel as the main house. And when it's time to explore or entertain, a ground-floor garage accommodates up to four vehicles. The Art of Outdoor Living Designed by a Dutch landscape architect who fell in love with Aruba, the garden is a living masterpiece. It’s arguably one of the most enchanting private gardens on the island. Mature palms, native flora, and immaculate green grass set the stage for outdoor living at its best. Enjoy evenings at the large outdoor bar by the pool, or unwind beside the tranquil pond and cascading waterfall. Thanks to the villa’s orientation, you will always find just the right mix of sun and shade, cooled naturally by Aruba’s constant trade winds. Everything Refreshed, Everything Ready Recently renovated with refined Dutch design touches, the villa’s brand new interiors are fresh, stylish and ready to move in. The spacious Hyundai Palisade in the garage comes with the villa, a convenient bonus for everyday use and perfect for exploring the island with family or guests in comfort and style. Whether you are dreaming of a private island retreat, a savvy investment property, or a family compound to pass down for generations, this is your chance to own one of the most extraordinary homes in Aruba. Ready to make your island dream a reality? For more information or schedule a viewing contact us at teamdmm@remaxaruba.com or call us at +297 564 5020.

The private, upscale environment of The Residences is well-situated in close proximity to a quiet stretch of pristine beach coastline, but also in easy access to the island’s casinos, shopping areas, medical facilities and all the pleasure offered in and around the Capital city of Oranjestad. At Home and at ease in Aruba One Happy Island Situated in the southernmost Caribbean Island, Aruba is outside the hurricane belt and experiences year-round warm temperatures with soothing trade winds.
Already well-known as a charming destination for its picturesque beach environment, Aruba is also prized for its friendliness, safety as well as its unique cultural mix.
As a member of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, Aruba is an ideal vacation community – offering a stable economy, low unemployment, and an educated, multi-lingual population. THE DIVI ADVANTAGE The Privileges of Ownership with an Established Resort Brand The Residences at Divi Village Golf & Beach Resort are managed by Divi Village – a well-respected name within the tourism industry with years of experience operating the largest resort complex in Aruba. Under the management of Divi Village, owning a second home at The Residences is a luxurious and carefree experience. As an owner of The Residences, you will enjoy both a stylish island home and all the privileges of a premiere Aruba vacation resort. The Residences have access to the grounds and the amenities of The Divi Village Golf & Beach Resort and offer views to tropically landscaped golf fairways and waterfalls as well as access to numerous amenities, which currently include spa, tennis, swimming pools and shops as well as various hotel services and maintenance plans.
The Residences at the Divi Village Golf & Beach Resort are an ideal residence or vacation home. However, should you elect not to stay in your condominium year-round, as an owner of The Residences you may be eligible to participate in a rental program managed by Divi Village.

Owners in The Residences may also be eligible to participate in a unique vacation exchange program through RCI (Resort Condominiums International), a network of over 3000 resorts worldwide. As an owner, you will be allowed to trade 3 weeks of vacation time in your private residence in exchange for vacation stays with an RCI-affiliated resort around the globe. Enjoy a luxury resort lifestyle, with dream vacations around the world. AMENITIES Condominiums Amenities Our living spaces maintain an Island feel while still boasting all the modern conveniences. Carefully thought-out details ensure effortless living in a luxurious home environment. Resort Amenities Swaying palms and lush green settings create a tranquil environment, bolstered by safety and security features, inherent within the design of the resort. Within this idyllic environment, owners and guests enjoy the freedom to choose from numerous options of pleasurable pursuits.

Nearby The Residences lies the spectacular clubhouse featuring a well-stocked pro shop, meeting facilities, a service desk with a condominium liaison on duty as well as spectacular restaurants:
“Mulligans” is casual, and comfortable, with views of the golf course and features a creative menu of world cuisine. The sports bar provides a social atmosphere in which to enjoy your favorite games. “Windows on Aruba” is a luxurious, upscale gourmet restaurant that is unrivaled in its presentations and competes with the best of what Aruba has to offer in fine dining. Owners in The Residences have access to the following amenities and services: Hotel Services General Optional amenities (at additional charge) THE ONLY LOCATION WHERE YOU CAN OUTRIGHT OWN PROPERTY ON HOTEL GROUNDS ON THE ISLAND OF ARUBA!
